channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: McKinsey & Company agrees to pay $650M for helping Purdue Pharma boost opioid sales
item.description: McKinsey & Company consulting firm has agreed to pay $650 million to settle a federal investigation into its work for opioids manufacturer Purdue Pharma, according to court papers filed in Virginia.

item.title: Woman who falsely accused Duke lacrosse players of rape in 2006 publicly admits she lied
McDonald’s employee who called 911 in CEO’s shooting is eligible for a reward, but it will take time
